task.title: Close all of your programs hello
task.shortdesc: You need to shut down everything else before installing major programs

step.cmd: If you are on a Windows system, click the X in the corner of eachprogram.
If you are on a Linux system, type kill -9 [PID] for each of yourprograms.
step.tutorialinfo: You might want to save your data first.

step.cmd: If you are on a Macintosh, you will have to ask someone else. Ihave a wonderful little iPod, but that is the limit of my experience withApple products.
